configuration.sources:
${basedir}/src/main/resources/mgmt-ptr-samples.xml com.rackspace.cloud.dns.api.beans
mgmt-dns-create-ptr-record POST 202 /1234/domains
domains[0].created domains[0].updated domains[0].recordsList.records[0].created domains[0].recordsList.records[0].updated domains[0].recordsList.records[0].id domains[0].recordsList.records[1].created domains[0].recordsList.records[1].updated domains[0].recordsList.records[1].id domains[0].recordsList.records[2].created domains[0].recordsList.records[2].updated domains[0].recordsList.records[2].id
mgmt-dns-delete-ptr-record DELETE 202 /1234/domains/9999999/records/PTR-6817754/192.0.2.8
mgmt-dns-list-ptr-record GET /1234/domains/9999999/records/PTR-6817754/192.0.2.8
domains[0].recordsList.records[0]
mgmt-dns-modify-ptr-record PUT /1234/domains/9999999/records/PTR-6817754/192.0.2.8
domains[0].recordsList.records[0]
id priority updated created type
${basedir}/src/main/resources/mgmt-samples.xml com.rackspace.cloud.dns.api.beans
mgmt-dns-search-domains-request.json mgmt-dns-search-domains-request.xml mgmt-dns-search-domains-request.response mgmt-dns-search-domains-request.response
mgmt-dns-search-domains /searchDomains?name=rackspace 200
domains[0].nameservers domains[0].recordsList
mgmt-dns-create-domains-request.json mgmt-dns-create-domains-request.xml

mgmt-dns-create-domains-req /1234/domains POST 202
mgmt-dns-create-domains-response.json mgmt-dns-create-domains-response.xml
${basedir}/src/main/resources/mgmt-create-domains-response-sample.xml com.rackspace.cloud.dns.api.beans
mgmt-dns-create-domains-res /1234/domains POST 202
${basedir}/src/main/resources/mgmt-limit-samples.xml com.rackspace.cloud.dns.api.management.beans
mgmt-dns-list-limit-groups /groups 200
mgmt-dns-list-limit-type-groups /groups/types/rate_limit 200
groupLimits[9] groupLimits[8] groupLimits[7] groupLimits[6] groupLimits[5] groupLimits[4]
mgmt-dns-list-limit-group /groups/default_customer_group 200
groupLimits[0]
mgmt-dns-list-user-group /1234/groups 200
groupLimits[9] groupLimits[8] groupLimits[7] groupLimits[6] groupLimits[3] groupLimits[2] groupLimits[1]
mgmt-dns-list-user-group-type /1234/groups/rate_limit 200
groupLimits[0]
mgmt-dns-update-user-group /1234/groups/high_limit_customer_group 204 PUT
mgmt-dns-delete-user-group /1234/groups/rate_limit 204 DELETE
